name: Taylor Love
highlights: Manager the day-to-day operation of Husky.
Former VP at Green Coffee Company, Largest coffee producer in colombia.
Extensive experience in agricultural production, globe supply chain Management, international trade and business development

name: Dr. Alveiro Salamanca
highlights: Based in Colombia, manages Husky Latam R&D.
M.S. and Ph.D. in soil fertility & plant nutrition from UC Davis.
Led development of efficient fertilizers & balanced nutrition for ICL Group, one of the world’s largest fertilizer companies.

name: Crawford Hawkins
highlights: Entrepreneur & investor in multiple software & coffee-related businesse.
Former hedge fund manager at Tiger & Elliott.
Bachelor of Science (B.S.) from the University of Virginia & Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.) from Columbia University.

name: Marcela Urueña
highlights: Former Deputy Minister of Agriculture in Colombia.
Held leadership positions in the National Federation of Coffee Growers and International Coffee Organization.

name: Joy Youwakim
highlights: Soil scientist and agroecologist with a background in product development and formulation optimization.
Interdisciplinary research scientist with experience conducting research projects with social science variables in mind.

name: Dr. Janneth Escudero
highlights: Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Biotechnology and Industrial-Environmental Microbiology.
Microbiologist by training and is passionate about exploring microbial diversity.
Manages R&D from the Husky lab in Medellin.
